pullRequest.title: [RW-4285][risk=NO] Changes to workspace description page
pullRequest.bodyText:
Database changes are part of PR : #3111
Workspace Screen has been updated with the following changes:
a) Add Option Ethics to the Research purpose  and extract Education and other option parallel to research purpose



b) Section 'summary of your research purpose'  has been updated with new question (scientific approach) and updated label for anticipated findings and intendedStudy


c) New questions have been added to record the researchers plan to disseminate their research findings
And what are the anticipated outcome of the research

d) The population of interest has options now for specific RACE/ AGE

PR checklist

[ X] This PR meets the Acceptance Criteria in the JIRA story
 The JIRA story has been moved to Dev Review
[ x] This PR includes appropriate unit tests
[ x] I have run and tested this change locally
[ x] If this includes an API change, I have updated the appropriate Swagger definitions and notified API consumers
 If this includes a new feature flag, I have created and linked new JIRA tickets to (a) turn on the feature flag and (b) remove it later

commit.message: change variable name to have List
split Liquibase change to another PR

nodes.bodyText: If it is null, I assume this returns null? It should probably return an empty list.

There is a null check here: https://github.com/all-of-us/workbench/pull/3109/files#diff-e5967f0cb03794422311275e49891c41R74
but this doesn't have one, so it could null pointer error. Could you add a null check to this?

Same thing where if this can return null, then this could null pointer error, and if it can't, then we don't need the null check above. (I think it could probably return an empty set rather than null)
